title: Nexlord: Grim Realities
description: Grim Realities is the third and final book in the epic NexLord series. The young NexLord Aerin must try to remove the dark shroud over his heart by going into the deadly Strangelands. Soon all the mysteries will be unveiled in shocking revelations. Aerin and his Bondmen must try a desperate ploy to enter the Fortress of Fear where the Dark Prophecies foretell his doom and other Grim Realities.
author: Philip Blood
